text: Wow, this is truly groundbreaking. I wonder how they managed to make such a leap in technology!
It's probably just a clever April Fools' prank. I highly doubt Google has actually figured out how to access parallel universes.
You never know, they might be onto something. Stranger things have happened in tech before.
I can't wait to check out Universe 42 - I heard they have better pizza there.
Haha, imagine if Universe 42 had StackOverflow without the snarky comments! I'd move there in a heartbeat.
Good luck with that. As a sysadmin, I can assure you that snark is a universal constant.
I'M READY TO TRADE MY CAR FOR A PORTAL GUN! WHERE DO I SIGN UP?
Just make sure you don't accidentally end up in a universe where the AI overlords have taken over. I've seen enough dystopian movies to know how that goes.
I wonder how many parallel universes it'll take to finally find the one where my code works on the first try.
Just one more... always one more.
Schrödinger's code: it both works and doesn't work until you observe it.
I bet Google Maps will still get my address wrong even in a parallel universe.
Can confirm. I live in Universe 12 and they STILL can't find my house.
